title: 5. Your finance department has asked you to provide their team access to view billing reports for all GCP projects. What should you do?
alternatives: A. Grant roles/billing.User IAM role to the finance group.
B. Grant roles/billing.ProjectManager IAM role to the finance group.
C. Grant roles/billing.Admin IAM role to the finance group.
D. Grant roles/billing. Viewer IAM role to the finance group.
